title: DDUH Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 15 Junior Resident Posts
description: Deen Dayal Upadhyay Hospital has recently released the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 15 Junior Resident Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS can grab this chance and apply for the DDUH Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligibe candidates can attend the walk-in at the address given below. If you are looking fo...
